task.name: importfitsidi
task.shortdescription: Convert a FITS-IDI file to a CASA visibility data set
task.description: Convert a FITS-IDI file to a CASA visiblity data set.
task.example:
Convert a FITS-IDI file to a CASA visibility data set:
Keyword arguments: fitsidifile -- Name of input FITS-IDI file default: none; example='3C273XC1.IDI' vis -- Name of output visibility file (MS) default: none; example: vis='3C273XC1.ms' async -- Run asynchronously default = false; do not run asychronously
